lifeAtInsider.title: Life at Insider One
lifeAtInsider.subtitle: For those who expect the unexpected. Are you ready to play bigger?

teams.title: Explore open roles
teams.subtitle: Discover our teams, making the world’s marketing and customer engagement teams unstoppable

teams.name: Customer Success
teams.description: Partner with the marketers behind the growth of some of the world’s most beloved brands.

teams.name: Sales
teams.description: Never take no for an answer. Build relationships and help our customers get what they need in a fun and fast competitive culture.

teams.name: Product & Engineering
teams.description: Looking for a thrill? Build game-changing products in a fast-paced growth environment with creative and curious minds.

teams.name: Finance & Business Support
teams.description: Do more than crunch numbers. Paint the picture of Insider’s performance across the world and influence the decisions that drive our future.

teams.name: Marketing
teams.description: From data junkies, designers, strategists, to storytellers, we’re the brand evangelists championing customer success and inspiring marketers from global brands to grow.

teams.name: CEO’s Executive Office
teams.description: One-of-a-kind experiences, high-powered conversations, and first-ever initiatives, if you thrive on the variety, you'll never have an ordinary day in the CEO's corner.

teams.name: Purchasing & Operations
teams.description: Excellence is a habit. As the guardians of happiness, our Operations team is always looking for ways to make our journeys at InsiderOne smoother.

teams.name: People and Culture
teams.description: We’re not HR. Our job isn’t screening talent for open positions. Our mission is to build a change movement led by talented and caring people from every corner of the world.

teams.name: Business Intelligence
teams.description: Deep thinkers. Dashboard commanders. Our Business Intelligence team dives deep into data to spot patterns and uncover opportunities to improve the way we tell stories.

teams.name: Security Engineering
teams.description: Security is at the foundation of customers’ trust in Insider. Oversee security and compliance and explore new ways to protect what matters most: people.

teams.name: Partnership
teams.description: Acquire, develop, and grow our partner network with digital agencies, technology providers, and consultancies. Share and radically redefine your digital expertise with others who are passionate about helping our partners succeed.

teams.name: Quality Assurance
teams.description: Never miss a thing? Obsess over every little detail? Our Q&A team is committed to testing everything we build to ensure it’s flawless for our customers (and theirs).

teams.name: Mobile Business Unit
teams.description: Constant innovation, one step ahead of the game, and exceeding user expectations are our rallying points on our way to building the top mobile marketing platform in the world.

teams.name: Partner Support Development
teams.description: Meet the creative problem solvers behind our success stories. Our Partner Support Development team helps customers see where they are and guides them to where they dream of being.

teams.name: Product Design
teams.description: Are you a problem-solving architect who is equally passionate about customer experience? Our Product Design team isn’t tied down to what came before, they’ve got their eyes on what’s next.

locations.title: Our locations
locations.subtitle: Explore our 30+ offices across the world, home to 1,500+ Insiders
